types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# A [[social]] [[convention]] involving the joint ownership of a [[feudal]] [[estate]] by a group of brothers in a family.
types.html:
frérèche m (plural frérèches)

  1. A social convention involving the joint ownership of a feudal estate by a group of brothers in a family.
trans: A social convention involving the joint ownership of a feudal estate by a group of brothers in a family.

title: frérèche
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fʁe.ʁɛʃ/
